name: Onde Estou!
description:
The Onde EstouI! It is mix of all games, for example: Portal, etc.

The categories are: Horror, Action, FPS, Boss and Puzzle.

| - Game Jam - |

FAQ:The game made alone devlog? R:Yes, I did it alone without a team! FAQ:Is the jam game first time? R:Yes, Create Jam game first time! And also the boss and the music. FAQ:How long does it take to make the game? R:Only 5 days and I deliver the game. FAQ: The music was created are? R:Instruments and Electronics. FAQ: Has the game possibly updated the future? R:No, because the game is Jam.(I mean only limit of days or hours. You google the game of jam.) FAQ:Was the game a Tournament or Contest? R:Yes, it was BigFry and there is a website: https://bigfry.tv/gamejamsummit/ FAQ:Test you did it yourself! R:I did it on live for 5 days and here it is: https://www.twitch.tv/danielreipt/videos
